pages.text: Oil is needed when saut√©ing, and is produced by resting $(l:worldgen/plants)walnuts$(/l) and an anvil (not consumed) in dolia. 8 walnuts yields a bottle of oil, which can be used 5 times.
You can place oil bottles in the world as gravy boats, which provides oil for adjacent pans. The directions that gravy boats face doesn't matter.
